```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# importing data
data <- read_csv("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQ9FlR9Jnryag3vJtrAD6O8vlkdO0jKpEUz2XHOCCDkc0DIqrNSgMyQUAM2RRfGFN8sxlbYSK64HAiH/pub?output=csv") %>% select(-Timestamp)

# changing column names
colnames(data) <- c("presence", "interaction", "life_affection", "sentiment", "verbal_attack",
                  "emotional_attack", "physical_attack", "thinking", "feel", "explanation")

# taking a sample of 16 values
set.seed(45)
data <- data %>% sample_n(16)
```
